name: Blowtato
about: The blowtato is a peculiar, highly reactive root vegetable, mostly found sprouting from the cracked earth of the Indigo Quarry. Much like the mine slimes that adore them, these spuds have a natural propensity for explosive flair due to a volatile compound within. Ranchers must handle them with extreme care, as a small puncture or "burp" is recommended before cooking to prevent a startling bang! For mine slimes, this explosive nature is pure delight, fueling their rock-shattering abilities and making the blowtato their favorite snack. Clever miners even use them to loosen stubborn rock formations, though caution is always advised.
